data.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba
data.synopsis: Tanjirou Kamado lives with his impoverished family on a remote mountain. As the oldest sibling, he took upon the responsibility of ensuring his family's livelihood after the death of his father. On a cold winter day, he goes down to the local village in order to sell some charcoal. As dusk falls, he is forced to spend the night in the house of a curious man who cautions him of strange creatures that roam the night: malevolent demons who crave human flesh. When he finally makes his way home, Tanjirou's worst nightmare comes true. His entire family has been brutally slaughtered with the sole exception of his sister Nezuko, who has turned into a flesh-eating demon. Engulfed in hatred and despair, Tanjirou desperately tries to stop Nezuko from attacking other people, setting out on a journey to avenge his family and find a way to turn his beloved sister back into a human. [Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Kimetsu no Yaiba were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump on the same day as the Japanese release. It was published in English as Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba by VIZ Media under its Shonen Jump imprint from July 3, 2018 to August 3, 2021. Kimetsu no Yaiba won the Special Prize at the 25th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize awards in 2021.

titles.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Tomioka Giyuu Gaiden
Kimetsu no Yaiba: Rengoku Kyoujurou Gaiden
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Stories of Water and Flame

data.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Gaiden
data.title_english: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Stories of Water and Flame
title_synonyms: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Tomioka Giyuu Gaiden
Kimetsu no Yaiba: Rengoku Kyoujurou Gaiden
data.synopsis: 1-2. Kimetsu no Yaiba: Tomioka Giyuu Gaiden 3-4. Kimetsu no Yaiba: Rengoku Kyoujurou Gaiden 5. Kimetsu no Aima!
data.background: Kimetsu no Yaiba Gaiden was published in English as Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Stories of Water and Flame by Viz Media on January 4, 2022.

titles.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Shiawase no Hana
Kimetsu no Yaiba: Flower of Happiness
鬼滅の刃 しあわせの花
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Flower of Happiness

data.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Shiawase no Hana
data.title_english: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Flower of Happiness
data.title_japanese: 鬼滅の刃 しあわせの花
title_synonyms: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Flower of Happiness
data.synopsis: A mystical flower offers a prosperous future for its bearer. Determined to find the flower for Nezuko, Tanjiro makes a harrowing journey up a mountain—but Inosuke reveals the flower’s true worth. In other tales, Zenitsu recalls the day he battled a demon to save a crying girl, a fortune-teller warns Zenitsu that he’ll die if a girl falls for him, Kanao helps Aoi learn her value apart from killing demons, and when Kimetsu Academy students search for the recipe to win over Mr. Tomioka, Mr. Rengoku ropes them into cooking! (Source: VIZ Media)
data.background: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Shiawase no Hana was published in English as Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Flower of Happiness by VIZ Media under the Shonen Jump imprint on October 25, 2022.

titles.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Kataha no Chou
鬼滅の刃 片羽の蝶
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - One-Winged Butterfly

data.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Kataha no Chou
data.title_english: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - One-Winged Butterfly
data.title_japanese: 鬼滅の刃 片羽の蝶
data.synopsis: Shinobu and Kanae ask Himejima to teach them how to slay demons. After he refuses, they must complete the impossible task of moving a giant rock to convince him to introduce them to trainers. In other tales, Zenitsu tricks Inosuke into helping him dig a hot spring under Uzui's training, Mitsuri grapples with her reason for becoming a Demon Slayer, Genya discusses his family with Sumi, the Hashiras try to make Tomioka smile, and Kimetsu Academy forms a rock band—much to Shinobu's chagrin! (Source: VIZ Media)
data.background: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Kataha no Chou was published in English as Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - One-Winged Butterfly by VIZ Media under the Shonen Jump imprint on February 28, 2023.

titles.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Kaze no Michishirube
鬼滅の刃　風の道しるべ
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Signs from the Wind

data.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Kaze no Michishirube
data.title_english: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Signs from the Wind
data.title_japanese: 鬼滅の刃　風の道しるべ
data.synopsis: Demon Slayer Masachika kills a demon to save Sanemi's life, and then he takes the younger boy under his wing. Years later, the pair investigates disappearing children and ends up facing off against one of the Twelve Kizuki! In other tales, Kanamori hopes to smooth out Hotaru's rough personality through marriage, Inosuke searches for Kiyo's stolen butterfly clip, Muichiro helps Kotetsu repair the Yoriichi Type Zero, and Rengoku leads a mission to hunt ghosts at Kimetsu Academy! (Source: VIZ Media)
data.background: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Kaze no Michishirube was published in English as Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Signs from the Wind by VIZ Media under the Shonen Jump imprint on June 27, 2023.

data.title: Kimetsu Gakuen!
data.synopsis: Zenitsu is late for class, and the only thing between him and Giyu's bamboo sword is one good excuse. Next, when Inosuke, Murata, and Zenitsu fail their midterm, they must endure the harshest math lesson of their lives. Then there's Uzui's explosive art class, Nezuko's first cavity, and Rengoku's forbidden pizza! (Source: VIZ Media)
data.background: Kimetsu Gakuen! has been published in English as Demon Slayer: Kimetsu Academy by VIZ Media under the Shonen Jump imprint since December 12, 2023.

data.title: Ayashi-ya
data.synopsis: Kazuya is a boy with a special gift, an ability that could change the fate of the world. He is highly sought after by youkai. When he was 12, his parents were slaughtered by a youkai that called himself Yasashiware. So he swore that he would avenge his parents by putting one thousand youkai heads on stakes. This is the adventure of Kazuya, the wind runner, as he treads through the land of japan to fulfill his vengeance! (Source: MU)

titles.title: Gekijouban Kimetsu no Yaiba: Mugen Ressha-hen Novelize
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Mugen Train Novelize
劇場版 鬼滅の刃 無限列車編 ノベライズ

data.title: Gekijouban Kimetsu no Yaiba: Mugen Ressha-hen Novelize
data.title_japanese: 劇場版 鬼滅の刃 無限列車編 ノベライズ
title_synonyms: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Mugen Train Novelize
data.synopsis: Tanjirou, along with Zenitsu, Inosuke, Nezuko, arrives at their next mission's destination, the Mugen Train, where over 40 individuals have vanished within a brief span of time. Teaming up with Kyoujurou, the Flame Hashira, Tanjirou confronts the hidden demon lurking within the train. However, what awaits them is an endless dream...!? (Source: Shueisha, translated)

titles.title: 超爆魔道伝スレイヤーズ

data.title: Slayers: Super Explosive Demon Story
data.title_japanese: 超爆魔道伝スレイヤーズ
data.synopsis: Lina Inverse, a wandering sorceress and bandit-killer, joins forces with roving swordsman Gourry Gabriev in what's supposed to be a quick union of convenience. This is the main slayers manga, adapted from the Slayers novels vol.1-8. The fourth volume is adapted from the Slayers Return movie.
data.background: Choubaku Madouden Slayers was published in English as Slayers: Super Explosive Demon Story by Central Park Media from July 9, 2002 to March 9, 2005, and in Polish as Slayers: Magiczni Wojownicy by J.P.Fantastica.

data.title: Oni
data.synopsis: This manga tells the story of a social group of children forced to eat the corpses of their peers in Japan in 1600. Even when the society was one of consumption and welfare, the excess and waste were beyond any illusion… (source: shoujo-manga.net)

data.title: Gwi
data.synopsis: Mu-Sang’s has a quest... He must find and kill every “Gwi” that has ever existed. He is determined, and won’t let anything get in his way, not even the imperial army! While traveling and searching for the remnants of Gwi, he meets a girl who also bears the same mark crossed out than he has. A fateful encounter? Were those two fated to meet? And why does he hold such a grudge against the “Gwi”? ... all are questions left to be answered! (Source: EasyGoingScans)

titles.title: 大正浪漫 鬼さんやめてえぇっ!!

data.title: Taishou Rouman: Oni-san Yameteee!!
data.title_japanese: 大正浪漫 鬼さんやめてえぇっ!!
data.synopsis: Ruku Minatomachi is a 15-year-old high school student from Yokohama. Her dream is to travel the world to eat delicious gourmet food. Upon being told by her parents that she's actually a highly efficient, time-traveling android, Ruku embarks on an adventure, traveling back to the Taisho Era (1912–1926) to search for her grandfather. She meets Oni-san upon her arrival and is whisked away to his domain. (Source: MU)

data.title: Demon Tune
data.synopsis: In Wizard City, an encounter between a ninja and a fairy begins a new legend. Bloody fights, demons and fantasy creatures are just some of the things that await our two protagonists. A new and fantastic adventure begins! (Source: MU)

titles.title: Demon Possession -デモンポゼッション-

data.title: Demon Possession
data.title_japanese: Demon Possession -デモンポゼッション-
data.synopsis: Humanity has found the perfect energy source that gives the wielder near god-like powers. This energy source has been named "Demon." The rare individuals that have the capabilities to wield this power are known as "Mediums." To become one of the Mediums, Taichi has transferred to the Meissner School. On the first day of transferring into the school, he literally runs into an energetic girl named Nui. She is a Medium and attends the Meissner School. Taichi will require her help to become a Medium himself and survive against hostile Mediums. (Source: MangaHelpers)

data.title: Return of the Mad Demon
data.synopsis: The Mad Demon, Jaha Lee, dreams of becoming the God of Martial Arts. Unfortunately, his dreams are dashed after he falls off a cliff while running from the Demonic Cult for stealing the Jade of Heaven. Yet this is not the end for Jaha—he awakens from the fall to find himself back in his 20s. With his knowledge of the future and of martial arts, he now has a chance at revenge and at getting life right this time. Will he be able to fulfill his dream this time around, or is he doomed to face the same fate yet again? (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)
data.background: Return of the Mad Demon is an adaptation of Sung Yujin's Gwangma Hoegwi web novel series. The series has been published digitally in English by Webtoon Entertainment since December 14, 2021.

data.title: Heavenly Demon Reborn!
data.synopsis: In an ancient world where martial artists reign supreme, Unseong can only watch as his master is brutally beaten to death after a false accusation of practicing forbidden demonic arts. Even after a valiant fight, he fails to kill those responsible and faces his own end. But fate has other plans... Instead of taking his last breath, he awakens as a child, training to be an elite soldier of a demonic sect. Now Unseong must embrace the demonic arts and harness power in his ultimate quest for revenge. (Source: Tapas Media)
data.background: Heavenly Demon Reborn! has been published digitally in English by Tapas Media since February 26, 2021. The volumes have been published by Ablaze since November 22, 2022.

titles.title: Demon King of the Royal Class
The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy
Demon King of the Royal Class

data.title: Demon King of the Royal Class
data.title_english: Demon King of the Royal Class
title_synonyms: The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy
data.synopsis: I died while I was reading hate comments on my novel. I was already in shock over my death, but some "Grim Reaper" appeared and told me that being a bad writer was a sin. To atone and make it into heaven, I was told I needed to survive past the ending in one of my novels. And so, I entered the novel "The Demon King is Dead"... "Damn it all!! Why did this have to happen to me?!" By all misfortune, the character I possessed was the Demon Prince, a character with no combat abilities—who dies at the very start of the story!! (Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)
data.background: Demon King of the Royal Class has been published digitally in English by Tapas Media since May 25, 2023.

titles.title: The Adventures of a Demon King's Daughter
I Was Born as the Demon Lord's Daughter
The Adventures of a Demon King's Daughter

data.title: The Adventures of a Demon King's Daughter
data.title_english: The Adventures of a Demon King's Daughter
title_synonyms: I Was Born as the Demon Lord's Daughter
data.synopsis: Life's not easy for a child of Heaven and Hell! Given a second chance to live, Jo Ara was happy to trade her dire past for a world of fantasy and magic. The only catch is she was reborn as Irene Neros Parjunel, the beloved newborn child of the southern demon king! With the god of the underworld and her deceased mother watching over her, she sets out to discover her place in this world. Throw in a snarky angel godmother and a stubborn demon godfather, and it's the perfect setting for mischief and chaos! Will Irene succeed in helping her father battle the threats that plague him? And after making plenty of friends along the way, can she finally experience true love, too? (Source: Tappytoon)
data.background: The Adventures of a Demon King's Daughter was published digitally in English by Tappytoon and in French by Delitoon.

data.title: Demon Sacred
data.synopsis: A symptom which causes one to physically regress till the point of disappearance. A pharmaceutical company which claims to be researching a cure and the cause for this syndrome. What are their motives? And what does a dragon slayer and even a handful of demons have in relation to all this? (Source: thelurker.net)
data.background: Demon Sacred had four volumes published in English by Tokyopop, from October 12, 2010 to March 1, 2011, before the company became defunct.

titles.title: The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts

data.title: The Demon King Levels Up
title_synonyms: The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts
data.synopsis: Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace. Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers—in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees. Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace? (Source: Tapas Media)
data.background: The Demon King Levels Up has been published digitally in English by Tapas Media since April 27, 2023.

titles.title: The Hero, the Demon, and the Villain
Hero x Demon King x Villain
The Hero, the Demon, and the Villain

data.title: The Hero, the Demon, and the Villain
data.title_english: The Hero, the Demon, and the Villain
title_synonyms: Hero x Demon King x Villain
data.synopsis: The three arts of swordsmanship are all that swordsmen seek to master in this world. Eager to learn, some will take dangerous paths, others will trick, and some will even kill. Serena R. Lavail, a possible hero, is one of those who seek to master the arts to save her family. To do so, she embarks on a mission that starts right in the enemy's lair. There she meets the villain, Kane S. Ronald, who has a mysterious past and a mysterious lost skill. Heroes, villains, foes, and friends... what will be the fate of these two? (Source: Webtoon Entertainment)
data.background: The Hero, the Demon, and the Villain has been published digitally in English by Webtoon Entertainment since April 26, 2023.

data.title: Look Here, Demon Lord!
data.synopsis: Though she's illustrated many web novels, Yejin never thought she'd wake up in one as Princess Elina following a random bike crash. Just when she's looking for a way back to her original world, the demon lord's butler shows up and offers her a tour of his castle. And so, Elina jumps at the opportunity to travel to the demon realm and learn magic that can transport her back to her own dimension. Little does she know that the demon lord's servants are scheming to make her his bride so he can produce an heir and strengthen his political power... (Source: Tappytoon)
data.background: Look Here, Demon Lord! has been published digitally in English by Tappytoon.

data.title: Demon Devourer
data.synopsis: The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition. While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon's trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together. With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured? (Source: Tapas Media)
data.background: Demon Devourer has been published digitally in English by Tapas Media since July 5, 2022.

data.title: Descent of the Demon Master
data.synopsis: Jinho Kang used to be an average teenager, before an accident took away his family and his ability to walk. After reincarnating in medieval China, he becomes the demon master known as the Crimson Emperor. When his life is tragically cut short, he wakes up back in his previous life, before the accident AND with his powers and martial arts prowess intact. All Jinho wants is to live a normal life, but he soon realizes that monsters exist even in the modern world, and only he can stop them. (Source: Tapas Media)
data.background: Descent of the Demon Master has been published digitally in English by Tapas Media since January 4, 2021.

titles.title: God, Please Make Me a Demon!
God, Please Make Me a Demon!

data.title: God, Please Make Me a Demon!
data.title_english: God, Please Make Me a Demon!
data.synopsis: At a glance, high-schooler Moran Baek appears to be a beautiful girl who's perfect in every way... or so it would seem. In reality, she is an exiled demon who has been trapped in a human body for over 5,000 years. When she learns that she is still unable to use her demonic powers despite finishing her exile, Moran despairs and struggles to find a way to become a demon again. One day, she accidentally discovers that doing a good deed restores her powers, and sets out to find a way to keep doing good deeds so she can return to her devilish ways. (Source: Tappytoon)
data.background: God, Please Make Me a Demon! was published digitally in English by Tappytoon and Webtoon Entertainment.
